price: Ampa sε, Yεde sukͻm anaa ͻpε, ne nnuaba sεeε twee Farao nkorͻfoͻ no aso sεdeε wͻde bɛtu wͻn ho foͻ.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلسِّنِينَ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad akhadhnā āla fir'ʿawna bil-sinīna wanaqṣin mina al-thamarāti laʿallahum yadhakkarūna
